author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Staples: 18 Gallon Plastic Tote w/ Lid Only $4 (Regularly $7.99)
text:
Need to get organized? Hop on over to Staples.com where they are offering up these highly rated 18 Gallon Plastic Flat Lid Totes for ONLY $4 (regularly $7.99). These storage bins are perfect for getting your garage organized, storing winter clothes and more!
If you are a Staples Rewards Member (FREE to be a member) , you will get an additional 2-5% cash back and FREE shipping on orders of $14.99 or more. OR you may be able to opt for free in-store pickup if available near you.
Snag a 14 Piece Food Storage Set for $8.99 (Thanks, Beth!)
